name: Where's My Drink?
description:
The local restaurant, The Salty Seahorse, has started to do pizza deliveries due to the pandemic and Benji decided it was the best thing ever. Shy little Benji doesn't like to leave his home much, but he loves pizza just a little too much to not ever go out to  get it. Now he doesn't even have to leave his home, they just bring it to him!

 It's not long before the delivery has been made, and Benji couldn't be more excited. Everything looks great, until he felt a bit parched. No drink!? Where was his Diet Doctor Kelp!?

Something seems a little fishy, and it's not just Benji.

He doesn't like confrontation, but he thought he should give the Salty Seahorse a call. It was a bit rude of them to not give him his drink, don't they know anything about customer service! It took a lot of courage, but he picked up the phone and made the call.

However, it seems things were not in Benji's favor, and to make things worse, the manager, Mr. Grabs, won’t give us back our money, or the drink! It was time for Benji to take matters into his own hands…

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to Where's My Drink?  A simple little "Hallway-with-Guard" game about a fish who simply just wants to get his drink so he can eat his pizza properly.  (1000% not based off of a joke from a certain show, I promise)

Play as Benji, a shy little guy tired of being taken for granted. He’s bubbly, he’s a crybaby, but he’s got his mind set on getting that drink!

But watch out! The manager knows when Benji is around. Mr. Grabs is greedy money-grubbing lobster, not to be confused with a certain cousin! He’s mean, always looking to bully poor Benji, but can also literally be blind to the money!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features

  • The game features a first-person point of view that offers a detailed look at the environment.
  • The level features two distinct restaurants to travel to and from with a guard and obstacles hoping to stop you from reaching your goal.
  • As a puzzle platformer, the player can interact with different aspects of the environment to get past the guard and reach the goal. Player will be able to use certain objects to help against the guard.
  • The guard is set to chase the player in a certain area. The player can distract the guard to get past them.
  • Game gives a lot of visual parody to a popular show for comedic affect as the game progresses.
  • Benji Naruto runs. What more could you ask for.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Keyboard

  • C Key OR F Key- Fire Dollar
  • X Key- Open Door
  • Space Key- Jump
  • WASD Keys OR Arrow Keys- Moves Character
  • Mouse- Moves Camera
  • ESC key - Pause
  • Click- Selection (for Menus)

Gamepad

  • Y Button- Fire Dollar
  • X Button- Open Door
  • B Button- Jump
  • Left Analog- Moves Character
  • Right Analog- Moves Camera
  • Start Button- Pause
  • A- Selection (for Menus)
